      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • registerClient

        public java.util.UUID registerClient(IGui clientGui)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Registers a client by creating a Player containing his stub. The player is then associated to a UUID in playersByUuid HashMap. The player is then placed into a core missing a player or a new one.
        Specified by:
        registerClient in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        clientGui - client's stub
        Returns:
        UUID generated for this client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
